articles.description: For a long time, the VO2 Max value was only of interest to competitive athletes, but today it can be found on many fitness watches. So what can it tell us about our overall health, and how can we improve it?

Updated Oct. 4, 2024 at 4:10 p.m.*
HAMBURG There was skepticism surrounding the Tour de France 2023: Could Danish cyclist Jonas Vingegaard really be that fast? So much better than the others? If so,… [+9934 chars]
